page.title: 11TWO RESIDENTS (1)
page.content: {MRS LUCAS-GIDLEY}used to own Halberton Garage, and she still lives next door. She had to sell up because the Link Road opened, this took 80% of her business away so now the garage has been turned into a pressure washing building. She has lived in Halberton all her life.She remembers back to when Halberton had a dirt road,at that time petrol cost 4.5 new pence per gallon now it costs Â£2.00 per gallon. Although the link road took her business away it was good for animals, children and the people generally. The worst change for her is vandalism, in the park there used to be a shelter but it was vandalised so they had to take it down.There are three council housing estates in Halberton,they are called {Rock view ,
